bilingual.source: I give the red rose to my friends.
bilingual.target: 我把红玫瑰送给我的朋友们。

bilingual.source: I give the white rose to my teachers.
bilingual.target: 我将白玫瑰献给我的老师。

bilingual.source: I give the yellow rose to my parents for teaching me that love is about trust.
bilingual.target: 我把黄玫瑰送给我的父母，因为他们教会我爱是关于信任的。

bilingual.source: I give the white rose to my teachers, who have taught me that there is no success without effort.
bilingual.target: 我把白玫瑰送给我的老师们，他们教会我没有努力就没有成功。

bilingual.source: The garden is full of red rose.
The rose bud is about to bloom.

list.abstract: rose（英[rəʊz]，美[roʊz]），英语单词，作为名词使用是指蔷薇科植物；玫瑰；玫瑰色等，近义词为rugosa，常用短语搭配有rose garden（玫瑰园）、China rose（月季花）。作为动词使用是指使成玫瑰色；使变红。 rose作为动词使用时也是英语单词rise的过去式，近义词为improved、advanced，反义词为fall、set，例句有“She cut off the annoying noise and rose from her bed.（她切断了烦人的噪音，从床上站起来。）”
Rose，出生于泰国清迈，泰国演员、模特。 Rose曾是泰国“十大人妖皇后”之一，在泰国有着极高的人气。2011年，与其中三位人妖皇后来福州，上演了一段震古烁今的《人妖恋》。2012年12月，出演的电影《人再囧途之泰囧》上映。2013年6月，rose签约中国经纪公司，成为第一位签约中国的特殊艺人。

yingyinNormal.en: I wish I could give this rose to you, Katniss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真希望能把这朵玫瑰花送给你，凯特尼斯。

yingyinNormal.en: Made with rose water and cumin. That means "Thank you."
yingyinNormal.zh: 用玫瑰水和小茴香制成的，意思是"谢谢"。

yingyinNormal.en: Access your current build, please. What is your name? Rose is a rose, is a rose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请使用当前版本，你叫什么名字？玫瑰之所以是玫瑰，正因为她是玫瑰。——美国诗人格特鲁德·斯泰因诗作《圣徒艾米莉》

yingyinNormal.en: I love seeing you at my table, Nicky. You remind me of a rose. An absolute rose, doesn't he?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能上我这儿吃晚餐真好，尼克，你让我想到玫瑰。他难道不像玫瑰吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Your father is a thief! Liar! He stole a rose. I asked the rose. Punish me, not him! No! He means forever! Apparently, that's what happens around here when you pick a flower!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你爸爸是个小偷！骗子！他偷了玫瑰。是我要的玫瑰。要罚就罚我吧！不行！他会关你一辈子！很显然，他家里的玫瑰花，外人摘不得。

yingyinNormal.en: For the enchantress had erased all memory of them, from the minds of the people they loved. But the rose she had offered was truly an enchanted rose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为女巫也将他们从他们所爱之人的脑海中抹去了。而她送给王子的玫瑰花真的是一朵魔法玫瑰。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what can I bring you from the market? A rose. Like the one in the painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，要我从市场给你带点什么过来？一支玫瑰，像画里的那样。

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard stood on me once, too, but he was just trying to see the Rose Parade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德也曾经站在我背上过，他当时是为了站高点看新年玫瑰花车大游行。

yingyinNormal.en: A life sentence for a rose? I received eternal damnation for one. I merely locking him away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过是朵玫瑰而已啊？我受到了一个永恒的诅咒。我只是把他关起来而已。

yingyinNormal.en: The Gavesgate is a particularly thorny rose. To prune it, start by lopping off the head and then snip away the budding shoots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种玫瑰花的刺特别的多，修建的时候 要先剪掉它的头，再摘掉它的花苞。

yingyinNormal.en: As a gift, she offered the Prince a single rose. Repulsed by her haggard appearance, the Prince turned the woman away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为答谢，她送给王子一支玫瑰。王子十分嫌弃形容枯槁的老婆婆，王子要赶走老婆婆。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this morning when we didn't think the rose could be for you, it seemed like maybe it hurt your feelings. I guess. A little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今早，我们都没想到玫瑰花可能是送给你的，看起来有点伤你的心了。我想是有一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Goodbye, Papa. Goodbye, Belle. Come on, Philippe. You know the way. I'll see you tomorrow! Right! Tomorrow, with the rose!
yingyinNormal.zh: 再见，爸爸。再见，贝儿。走了，菲利普，你认识路的。明天见！好的，明天见。给你带玫瑰。

yingyinNormal.en: So after dinner... Well, I'm not even faintly like a rose. Nick wanted to go into town. Right, Nick? To the Yale Club. Nicky, stay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等下吃完饭。我可没玫瑰那么脆弱。尼克想去镇上逛逛，对吧？去耶鲁俱乐部。尼克，就待在这儿吧。

yingyinNormal.en: The rose gold with the waves that I told you that I loved? Yeah, that's the one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我超爱的那个玫瑰金带波纹的手链吗？对，就是那个。

yingyinNormal.en: And when he got food poisoning at the Rose Bowl Parade, he begged a deity he doesn't believe in to end his life quickly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在玫瑰碗橄榄球赛游行时食物中毒，还求过一个他不信奉的神让他死得痛快。

yingyinNormal.en: The city expanded, into gorgeous inner city suburbs like Paddington, harbor neighborhoods like Rose Bay, and into beachside communities up and down the coast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个城市不断发展，造就出帕丁顿等极其吸引的内城郊区、港口邻近地区玫瑰湾，并沿岸兴建了不同海滨小区。

yingyinNormal.en: Open your heart to me, Rose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用心来爱我，萝丝。

yingyinNormal.en: You know I don't like that, Rose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你明知道我不喜欢你这样。

yingyinNormal.en: Lady Rose? That's one word for her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯小姐吗？可以这么说吧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 玫瑰; 蔷薇; 月季
(a bed of roses)称心如意的境地

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 称心如意的境遇；安乐窝

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 玫瑰色的；玫瑰红的；肤色红润的；脸红的；乐观的；有希望的；愉快的；安逸的

word_family.mean: n. 蔷薇科植物；玫瑰；蔷薇；象征玫瑰或玫瑰花形的东西；莲蓬式喷嘴；玫瑰色；玫瑰红；玫瑰花；蔷薇花

sense_info_list.en: a showy and usually fragrant white, yellow, pink, or red flower that grows on a prickly shrub
sense_info_list.zh: 玫瑰; 蔷薇; 月季

examination_example.sentence: It's especially vulnerable to light damage, and by the mid-1990s, Gilardi's pumpkins, <highlight>roses</highlight>, and other figures were splitting and crumbling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它特别容易受到光损伤，到20世纪90年代中期，吉拉迪的南瓜、玫瑰和其他作品都开始分裂和破碎。

examination_example.sentence: Those pieces included small beds of <highlight>roses</highlight> and other items as well as a few dozen "nature carpets"—large rectangles decorated with foam pumpkins, cabbages, and watermelons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些作品包括几小床玫瑰和其他物品，以及几十个“天然地毯”——用泡沫南瓜、卷心菜和西瓜装饰的大长方块。

sense_info_list.zh: (a bed of roses)称心如意的境地

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, life is not a bed of <highlight>roses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，生活并不尽如人意。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>rose</highlight>-tint our memories and put ourselves into self-affirming situations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会美化自己的记忆，进行自我肯定。

examination_example.sentence: Preliminary inspections also suggested the three ornate (装饰华丽的) stained glass "<highlight>rose</highlight>" windows appeared to have survived the fire, officials said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们说，初步检查还表明，三扇华丽的彩色玻璃“玫瑰”窗似乎在火灾中幸存了下来。

examination_example.sentence: Grandma's <highlight>rose</highlight> garden and Dad's vegetable garden might be good or bad, but that's not what's important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奶奶的玫瑰园和爸爸的菜园可能打理地好也可能不好，但那不是重要的。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 玫瑰花园；玫瑰园；蔷薇花园

examination_example.sentence: When Tim was a boy, he met a girl named <highlight>Rose</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂姆小的时候，遇到了一个叫罗斯的女孩。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Rose</highlight>'s father is the busiest in the hospital, because he is an excellent doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗斯的父亲是医院里最忙的，因为他是一名优秀的医生。

examination_example.sentence: Sadly, Wonderland remained a dream when <highlight>Rose</highlight> died.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可悲的是，罗斯死后，仙境仍然是一个梦。

sense_info_list.en: a showy and usually fragrant white, yellow, pink, or red flower that grows on a prickly shrub
sense_info_list.zh: 玫瑰; 蔷薇; 月季

examination_example.sentence: Although <highlight>roses</highlight>, sunflowers and tomatoes are often grown in British gardens, they originally (起初) grew wild in other countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然玫瑰、向日葵和西红柿通常在英国的花园里种植，但它们起初在其他国家是野生的。

examination_example.sentence: On special days, people often use <highlight>roses</highlight> or forget-me-nots to express love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在特殊的日子里，人们通常用玫瑰或勿忘我来表达爱意。

word_usage.usage: the Chinese rose或the rose of China的意思是“月季花”。
